channel.title: This shit is getting really ficking old! 508!
channel.description:
[size=12pt]All i need is some help from one god damn person and no one will! Fuck! ITs taken months for me to figure this out! my problem is that i cant figure out how to animate npcs; meaning making them attack, defend, die, walk, etc! So can i please have some damn help???? this community suckks ass because 9 times out of 10 i never get help! so help me! PLEAAAAAAAAAAAASE[/size]
[size=18pt]THIS IS A 508[/size]

item.title: This shit is getting really ficking old! 508!
item.dc:creator: @flamehair9 flamehair9
item.description:
@flamehair9 wrote:

[quote=“Dell, post:12, topic:423222”][quote author=flamehair9 link=topic=525875.msg3829187#msg3829187 date=1322429467]

Go to NPCHandler and search for

Under that you should see a bunch of Cases, now the way they are set up

Now for the Death Animations,

Search for:

and its same set-up .

Hope this helps, Dell.

im using a 508 i cant find it and yeah i definiatly dont have npcHandler.java.
[/quote]

Well then that would of been a little smart to mention . .

if (Class49.packetOpcode == 10) { int animationDelay = Class68_Sub13_Sub8.incomingVector.readUByteS(); int animationId = Class68_Sub13_Sub8.incomingVector.readLEUShortA(); int npcListPtr = Class68_Sub13_Sub8.incomingVector.readLEUShortA(); NPC npc = Class102.localNPCs[npcListPtr]; if (npc != null) Class101.forceNPCAnim(0, animationId, npc, animationDelay); Class49.packetOpcode = -1; return true; }

and frame structure. . .

{ UBYTES animdelay; LEUSHORTA animid; LEUSHORTA npclistptr; }[/quote]

Where does that go?? i have no idea what to do with that?

Read full topic

and frame structure. . .
